Ageing with Python and Cytoscape

Welcome to Ageing with Python and Cytoscape.

These module will show you how to use Python to automate the creation of ageing related networks over Cytoscape.
For questions please feel free to contact us.

This module will teach how to automate the creatio of networks involved in ageing based on your RNAseq data set.
Ageing pathways Reference repositories Python and cytoscape Input data Building your network
